channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP GRC Access Control Emergency Access Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP GRC Access Control Emergency Access Management

item.title: CVE-2022-39801|2024-08-03T12:07:41.949Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20grc%20access%20control%20emergency%20access%20management
item.description: SAP GRC Access control Emergency Access Management allows an authenticated attacker to access a Firefighter session even after it is closed in Firefighter Logon Pad. This attack can be launched only within the firewall. On successful exploitation the attacker can gain access to admin session and completely compromise the application.
